title: Deterministic Commitment Summary Manifest (DCSM)
description: Finalized, immutable summary confirming a successful, deterministic state transition (Psi_N -> Psi_N+1) following P-01 PASS, optimized for rapid verification.

AxiomaticVetoStatus.description:
Validation checks confirming negation of all mandatory vetoes. A value of 'true' indicates the veto condition was successfully negated.
(i.e., The system state is safe to commit).

pvlm_status.description:
Policy Veto Lockout Negation status ($
eg$PVLM). Must be true.

mpam_status.description:
Minimum Performance Assurance Negation status ($
eg$MPAM). Must be true.

adtm_status.description:
Anomaly Detection Threshold Negation status ($
eg$ADTM). Must be true.

state_root_hash.description: Cryptographic hash (e.g., SHA3-256) of the resulting system state root.

tvcr_index.description: Index linking to the complete Trace and Veto Context Registry (TVCR) entry.

protocol_version.description: SAG Specification version confirming compliance (e.g., V94.1)

dse_epoch_id.description: Unique, deterministic identifier for this Decentralized State Evolution (DSE) event.

status_p01.description: P-01 Finality Checkpoint result. MUST be true for commitment.

metrics_final.description: The quantified metrics used to satisfy P-01 verification (Utility Axioms).

cftm.description: Commitment Finality Threshold Margin (Epsilon, must be > 0).

context_status.description: Environmental Context Verification Status (ECVM success). MUST be true.
